name: Opacity
description:
Warning! Flashing lights and Scary elements involved!
Apish Box Games presents newest installment - Opacity, a short space horror mission, where you are a crew member trying to find an engineer on the ship. 

This is my second single installment. All the assets are made by me, music and some of the sound effects are also self made. 

In game Settings: Movement - W, A, S, D keys; Interact with E, or left mouse click. 

Enjoy the experience and thanks for playing.
